mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board2 ( article_no, article_title, article_content, party_location , user_no, create_date, is_delete, article_hit, board_no , meet_time) VALUES ( #{article_no}, #{article_title},#{article_content}, #{party_location, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{user_no}, sysdate, #{is_delete}, #{article_hit}, #{board_no} , to_date(#{meet_time},'YYYY-MM-DDHH24MI'))
mapper.select: SELECT article_no ,board_no ,article_title ,article_content ,meet_time ,to_char(meet_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') meet_time_date ,to_char(meet_time, 'HH24') meet_time_clock ,to_char(meet_time, 'MI') meet_time_min ,to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date ,to_char(terminate_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') terminate_date ,article_hit ,create_date ,party_location ,user_no ,(SELECT user_nick FROM tb_user2 u WHERE u.user_no = b.user_no) user_nick ,(SELECT count(*) FROM tb_comment2 c WHERE c.board_no = #{board_no} AND c.article_no = #{article_no } AND c.comment_order = 0) cnt_comment ,(SELECT count(*) FROM tb_recommend2 r WHERE b.board_no = #{board_no} AND b.article_no = r.article_no) cnt_recommend ,(SELECT count(*) FROM tb_recommend2 r WHERE b.board_no = #{board_no} AND b.article_no = r.article_no AND user_no=#{user_no}) isRecommend FROM tb_board2 b WHERE board_no = #{board_no} AND article_no = #{article_no}
